gameDetails.matchup: Kansas City Chiefs at Dallas Cowboys

keyFactors.title: Big Money Indicator
keyFactors.description: Sharp action heavily sided with Cowboys despite public on Chiefs

keyFactors.title: Money vs Bets Split
keyFactors.description: Large differential between bet % and money % favoring Dallas

keyFactors.title: Line Movement
keyFactors.description: Line moved from KC -4 to -3 despite public on Chiefs

quarterBreakdown.description: Cowboys took control with TD run

whatWentRight.title: Sharps Were Right
whatWentRight.description: Professional bettors correctly identified Cowboys value

whatWentRight.title: Faded the Public
whatWentRight.description: Public was heavy on Chiefs but sharps knew better

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: Sharp money alignment paid off perfectly.

closingLineValue.verdict: Captured value by following sharp action

keyTakeaways: Big Money + Sharp Action alignment is powerful
verdict: Sharp fund thesis confirmed. Big Money indicator was green, sharps were on Cowboys, and they won outright 31-28.
